definition: earnestly and sincerely (idiom); with all sincerity
see 誠心誠意|诚心诚意[cheng2 xin1 cheng2 yi4]

sentences.english: He has a sincere desire to help you.
sentences.chinese: 他是诚心诚意地想帮助你。

sentences.english: The tone fo apology indicated her sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 她道歉的口气表明了她的诚心。

sentences.english: Iago. I protest, in the sincerity of love and honest kindness.
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古我发誓这一种意思完全出于一片诚心。

sentences.english: I say that with my hand on my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我说这话完全是诚心实意。

sentences.english: Mobile phone have problem, cannot receive information, sincerely want to ask direct phone to contact.
sentences.chinese: 手机有问题，收不到信息，诚心要请直接电话联系。

sentences.english: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.
sentences.chinese: 作长老的写信给亲爱的该犹，就是我诚心所爱的。

sentences.english: As long as I sincerely practice benevolence, it will be near.
sentences.chinese: 只要我诚心向仁，仁就到来了。

sentences.english: In fact, they may even mean it as they define it.
sentences.chinese: 按照他们的定义，这也许甚至是诚心实意的。

sentences.english: Pay deep respect to all people, no matter what kind of person they may be.
sentences.chinese: 不论是什么类型的人，都要诚心地尊重他们。

sentences.english: If you are sincere enough, maybe he will change his mind.
sentences.chinese: 你要是诚心，说不定也会金石为开，让他改变心意呢。

sentences.english: In real worship of the one true God we get beyond a focus on our selves.
sentences.chinese: 在诚心敬拜独一真神时，我们不再以自己为中心。

sentences.english: "Outstanding quality" We are hereby cordial to welcome customers at home and abroad to talk business by letter or telephone.
sentences.chinese: 谨此，我们诚心欢迎国内外客户来函来电洽谈业务。

sentences.english: Bring my sincere, send me "into the word" blessing.
sentences.chinese: 带上我的诚心诚意，送上我“成字”的祝福。

sentences.english: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.
sentences.chinese: 并愿所有诚心爱我们主耶稣基督的人，都蒙恩惠。

sentences.english: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.
sentences.chinese: 1作长老的写信给亲爱的该犹，就是我诚心所爱的。

sentences.english: But some politicians must be sincere about being fiscally responsible.
sentences.chinese: 一些政客必须诚心诚意的对财政政策负责。

definition: earnestly and sincerely (idiom); with all sincerity
to have a mind to/to intend to/deliberately/considerate
